questions.Name of organisation: Describe the name of the organisation from the document, in a few words

questions.Summary: Brief descrption of financial risk assessment, in one line

questions.Industry: Give a brief descrition of the industry segment in which this company operates in, within 200 words

questions.Proposed loan: Give a brief one line description of borrower's cash flow and financial capacity

data.heading: Business Profile
questions: Brief description of the company in 2 lines
What is the specialization and the Unique selling proposition of the company? in 2 lines
Description on the market and the target segment company is trying to provide services to? in 2 lines
Brief Description of Competitors, Challenges , market condition and market sentiment in relation to company industry segment ?

data.heading: Business Model
questions: What are the revenue streams of the company with emphasis on critical revenue? in 2 lines
Which customer segment it is Company targeting and how effective it is ? in 2 lines
What are the Key activities company performs to maintain profitability and sales? in 2 lines
What are the Channels the company uses for selling and service other than website? in 2 lines
What are the Value proposition the company is offering ? in 2 lines

data.heading: Management Structure
questions: Classify the company on the basis of Size, Ownership and the type of ownership in few lines
Stake Holder's analysis for the company in few lines
Who is the CEO, Managing director, COO, CIO of the company
